Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
The Main class provides a command-line interface for selecting and performing various barcode encoding and decoding methods. It supports encoding ZIP Codes into POSTNET barcodes, decoding POSTNET barcodes into ZIP Codes, encoding UPCAs, and decoding UPCA barcodes.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static void
    decodePostnet(Scanner scanner)
    Decodes a POSTNET barcode to a ZIP code and displays the provided binary representation and the zip code.
    private static void
    decodeUpca(Scanner scanner)
    Decodes a UPCA barcode and displays the check digit and the decoded product code.
    private static void
    encodePostnet(Scanner scanner)
    Encodes a ZIP Code to POSTNET format and displays the provided zip code, its binary representation, and the barcode representation.
    private static void
    encodeUpca(Scanner scanner)
    Encodes a UPCA code and displays the encoded binary representation.
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The main method that serves as the entry point for the barcode encoding and decoding application.
